abstract: An auction of Ally Financial’s Residential Capital unit has advanced into the second round, with some would-be buyers circling the assets, but a sale of the mortgage lender still faces hurdles.
snippet: An auction of Ally Financial’s Residential Capital unit has advanced into the second round, with some would-be buyers circling the assets, but a sale of the mortgage lender still faces hurdles.
lead_paragraph: An auction of Ally Financial‘s Residential Capital unit has advanced into the second round, with some would-be buyers circling the assets, but a sale of the mortgage lender still faces hurdles, Reuters reports, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: ResCap Auction Advances, but Hurdles Remain
